name: resabs2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)), wss(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1))
-| wss(c1, c2)
-| wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1))
-| wss(c1, c2)
-| wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1))
-| wss(c1, c2)

comment: Absorption law for restriction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
